title: Iberico pork pluma with spring onion and black pepper miso
description: A special cut of pork is given even more amazing flavour with miso and black pepper rub.
ingredients: 20g/¾oz carrot, cut into fine julienne strips
20g/¾oz cucumber, cut into fine julienne strips
20g/¾oz daikon, cut into fine julienne strips
20g/¾oz leek, white part only, cut into fine julienne strips
10g shiso leaves (available online), cut into fine julienne strips
